programme.title: Madhubala - Ek Ishq Ek Junoon
programme.desc: A young girl who was born on a film set has grown up surrounded by the movie industry. She is a simple girl who works as a beautician, nonetheless. When she meets RK, a well-known superstar, her life is changed.

programme.title: Uttaran
programme.desc: Story of friendship and rivalry between rich kid Tapasya and her maid's daughter Ichcha.

programme.title: Uttaran
programme.desc: Story of friendship and rivalry between rich kid Tapasya and her maid's daughter Ichcha.

programme.title: Shrimad Bhagwat Mahapuran
programme.desc: Shrimad Bhagwat Mahapuran is the divine discourse spoken by the supreme Lord Krishna. Enlighten yourself with the transcendental knowledge of the most profound spiritual nature that is heavily drawn from stories and legends of Hindu mythology. Watch the perfect blend of mythology and philosophy of Hindu traditions in this gripping narrative.

programme.title: Naagin S03
programme.desc: Shivanya, the daughter of a shape-shifting snake couple, sets out to avenge her parents, who are murdered. While on her mission, she marries Ritik, the son of one of the murderers

programme.title: Khatra Khatra Khatra
programme.desc: Celebrities and hosts team up against the fans of the show in a series of games, the winner of which gets to choose the punishment for the losing team.

programme.title: Ram Siya Ke Luv Kush
programme.desc: Luv and Kush, the sons of Lord Rama and Sita, grow up in Valmiki's ashram, unaware of their lineage. They get curious about their father's identity.

programme.title: Naagin - Desh ki Raksha Me
programme.desc: Ritik Raheja, a savvy tycoon, thinks love and religion weaken ambition and success.

programme.desc: Ritik Raheja, a savvy tycoon, thinks love and religion weaken ambition and success.

programme.title: Sasural Simar Ka
programme.desc: It tells the story of two sisters, Simar and Roli, who end up in the same home by marrying two brothers, Prem and Siddhant.

programme.title: Laagi Tujhse Lagan
programme.desc: Meet Nakusha, a stunning girl who hides her beauty to dodge unwanted attention and the challenges that come with it. It's a journey of self-protection!
